channel.title: TheEconomist on Who wonders ponders
channel.description: Recent content in TheEconomist on Who wonders ponders

item.title: Final consumption expenditure of households
item.description: In 2015 I was working on my master thesis “The integration of (QU)AIDS and input-output analysis in a panel data setting” and had to analyse the structure of household expenditure. I stumbled open several visualizations in The Economist (World and EU) while searching for information on this topic. Thinking that they looked great I wanted to replicate these with R. The way I chose to do it is based on the question in stackoverflow.
